name: SHIBA ON BASE
description: SHIB is bringing the Shiba Inu spirit of loyalty and fun to the Base ecosystem Schismatic Definition: A schismatic is someone who creates a schism. Schism: When there is a schism, a group or organization divides into two groups as a result of differences in thinking and beliefs. Applied to SHIB: Schismatic Shiba represents the evolutionary split from the original SHIB on ETH, boasting a proper auto deflationary contract with true decentralization. Layer one SHIB was taken over by a profit hungry, corrupt, and centralized team. SHIB on Base represents Ryoshi's vision without greed. Join the real revolution as it was intended. Shiba Inu (SHIB) is our key token, embodying a global, decentralized, community-driven currency. Launched on Base Chain, this evolved token is a global sensation, accepted at numerous places directly and bringing enhanced utility to the ecosystem.
